caddy discovered that the concentrate in these two deliveries were a chemical concoction with no apple juice at all , and that baby food made from it would cause serious damage to health .茶叶罐发现，集中在这两个交货的化学混合物，没有苹果汁在所有，而且婴儿食品从它会造成严重损害健康。

entry.def: A concoction is something that has been made out of several things mixed together.

example.ex: ...a concoction of honey, yogurt, oats, and apples.
example.tran: 蜂蜜、酸奶、燕麦和苹果调制的混合物

means.word_mean: 1. any foodstuff made by combining different ingredients;

sentences.sentence: "he volunteered to taste her latest concoction"
"he drank a mixture of beer and lemonade"

means.word_mean: 2. an occurrence of an unusual mixture;

sentences.sentence: "it suddenly spewed out a thick green concoction"

means.word_mean: 3. the invention of a scheme or story to suit some purpose;

sentences.sentence: "she has no peer in the concoction of mystery stories"

means.word_mean: 4. the act of creating something (a medicine or drink or soup etc.) by compounding or mixing a variety of components
